pr_title: [SMALLFIX] Fix AFS.getFileBlockLocations when file is null

timeline.message: [SMALLFIX] Fix AbstractFileSystem.getFileBlockLocations when file is null

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't this just be the same as old code, but moved to after the null check?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Neh. Because it seems like there is a debug message for when the code returns AND when the code gets called. (Note the LOG.debug further down this code)
replies.author: bradyoo
